item.title: MIUI V13.0.6.0.SLMCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K40S China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Codename: munch

Version: V13.0.6.0.SLMCNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: 50ff15e59b0529e6b52818620c252e80

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
Fix: CPU got overloaded in some cases when a device was used in well-lit outdoor environments
[MIUI+]
Optimization: Better MIUI+ connectivity for mobile devices and computers

item.title: MIUI V13.0.10.0.SLMCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K40S China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K40S China

Codename: munch

Version: V13.0.10.0.SLMCNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: 6ce5c0591dc97fd4f761a3934605d1f2

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to June 2022. Increased system security.
[Mi Smart Hub]
New: Mi Smart Hub now allows transferring audio and video playback to other connected devices
New: You can now use Mi Smart Hub for app handoff across connected devices
New: Mi Smart Hub now offers options for your smartphones, tablets, and TVs
New: You can control your devices and use Mi Smart Hub in Control center now

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
